projectFiles

Class RDFConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • projectFiles.RDFConnector

  • public class RDFConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a connection to the RDF file for reading and writing data
    Author:
    Luke Heavens & Ben Carr
